content:
According to the instructions from Russia, a local resident was going to land in the air.

About thisShe reported on March 5SBU.

According to the department, for the commission of the crime, the person involved in their own premises made a homemade explosive device with remote control. He received the instruction for the manufacture of explosives from the Russian special service.

The finished device was hidden in the boxes of fruit, then send them to the cargo compartment of one of the postal operators.

Upon receipt of the order of delivery "Order" to the mail, the person involved had an explosive with a phone call.

According to the data, the invaders hoped that undermining institutions would lead to numerous casualties among civilians and spread panic in the frontline.

But the SBU staff worked for ahead - exposed the person involved at the stage of preparing the terrorist attack.

In addition, during the investigation, the SBU found that the additional task of the Russian agent was to identify the places of mass concentration of personnel and equipment of the Armed Forces.

He had to transmit the information to the aggressor to prepare sabotage against defense forces or to perform air strikes.

According to the investigation, the hostile associate was a local resident. At the beginning of 2023 he was remotely recruited by a staff member of the 316th Intelligence Center of the General Directorate of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Russia (known as the GRU).

To involve a man in silent cooperation, the Russian special service attracted him a friend - a resident of a temporarily occupied part of the region.

In the future, the hostile agent received a terrorist attack, as well as instructions and money for explosive production, due to the "liaison" task.

In the case of undermining and performing other hostile tasks, the occupiers promised their agent a monetary "reward".

Currently, investigators of the Security Service have informed the Russian agent of suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

He is threatened with life imprisonment.

Earlier in the DnieperThey were detainedRussian spy, who followed the Ukrainian air defense.
